# ch-sidebar



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property                     | Attribute                       | Description                                                                                                                                                         | Type      | Default     |
| ---------------------------- | ------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `expandButtonAccessibleName` | `expand-button-accessible-name` | Specifies a short string, typically 1 to 3 words, that authors associate with an element to provide users of assistive technologies with a label for expand button. | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `expandButtonCaption`        | `expand-button-caption`         | Specifies the caption of the expand button.                                                                                                                         | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `expanded`                   | `expanded`                      | Specifies whether the control is expanded or collapsed.                                                                                                             | `boolean` | `true`      |
| `showExpandButton`           | `show-expand-button`            | `true` to display a expandable button at the bottom of the control.                                                                                                 | `boolean` | `true`      |


## Events

| Event            | Description                                                                   | Type                   |
| ---------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------- |
| `expandedChange` | Emitted when the element is clicked or the space key is pressed and released. | `CustomEvent<boolean>` |
